00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PUSH_BUTTON_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PUSH_BUTTON_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 using namespace lubyk;
00034 
00035 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00036 #include "mimas/constants.h"
00037 
00038 #include <QtGui/QPushButton>
00039 #include <QtGui/QMouseEvent>
00040 
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 namespace mimas {
00044 
00051 class Button : public QPushButton, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00052   Q_OBJECT
00053   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00054   Q_PROPERTY(float hue READ hue WRITE setHue)
00055 
00056 public:
00057   Button(const char *title = NULL, QWidget *parent = NULL)
00058       : QPushButton(title, parent) {
00059     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00060   }
00061 
00062   ~Button() {
00063     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00064   }
00065 
00066   QString cssClass() const {
00067     return QString("button");
00068   }
00069 
00070   QSize size_hint_;
00071 
00072   void setHue(float hue) {
00073     hue_ = hue;
00074     update();
00075   }
00076 
00077   float hue() {
00078     return hue_;
00079   }
00080 
00081 protected:
00082   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00083     if (!click(event, MousePress)) {
00084       QPushButton::mousePressEvent(event);
00085     }
00086   }
00087 
00088   virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00089     if (!click(event, DoubleClick)) {
00090       QPushButton::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00091     }
00092   }
00093 
00094   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00095     if (!click(event, MouseRelease)) {
00096       QPushButton::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100 private:
00101   bool click(QMouseEvent *event, int type);
00102 
00103   float hue_;
00104 };
00105 
00106 } // mimas
00107 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PUSH_BUTTON_H_
